newsitem.title: ROMANIA: RADIO ROMANIA AFTERNOON HEADLINES AT 1 PM.
newsitem.headline: RADIO ROMANIA AFTERNOON HEADLINES AT 1 PM.

text.p: * Development of economic ties between Romania and Venezuela was the main issue of talks between the chairmen of Romania's and Venezuela's senate.
* The efforts for Romania's early NATO admission must be continued, leaders of the National Peasant Party (PNTCD), told a news confference.
The PNTCD's general secretary, Radu Vasile, said that the possibility that Romania will not secure early admission must also be considered.
* The problems of domestic air transport were analysed by Romania's Transport Minister Traian Basescu with managers from local airlines. -- Bucharest Newsroom 40-1 3120264
